code: export var riseText=function riseText(e){var risetext=document.querySelector('.risetext');console.log(risetext);var enclose=document.querySelector('.page-header_title-main');console.log(enclose);var encloseText=Array.from(enclose.innerText.split(''));console.log(encloseText);var string=encloseText.map(function(x){if(x===' '){return" ";}else{return"".concat(x,"");}}).join('');console.log(string);string=string.replace(' ',' ');enclose.innerHTML="".concat(string,"");var letters=Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('.letter'));function timeout(){setTimeout(function(){risetext.classList.toggle('show');//timeout(); },500);}timeout();letters.forEach(function(letter,i){var style="transition-delay: ".concat(50*i,"ms;");letter.setAttribute('style',"".concat(style));});};
